General_Health.description: The general health condition of the individual, e.g., Poor, Good, Very Good.

value_dict.Poor: The individual has a poor general health condition.
value_dict.Very Good: The individual has a very good general health condition.
value_dict.Good: The individual has a good general health condition.
value_dict.Fair: The individual has a fair general health condition.
value_dict.Excellent: The individual has an excellent general health condition.

value_dict.Within the past 2 years: The individual had a medical checkup within the past 2 years.
value_dict.Within the past year: The individual had a medical checkup within the past year.
value_dict.5 or more years ago: The individual had a medical checkup 5 or more years ago.
value_dict.Within the past 5 years: The individual had a medical checkup within the past 5 years.
value_dict.Never: The individual never had a medical checkup.

Heart_Disease.description: Whether the individual has heart disease or not.

value_dict.No: The individual does not have heart disease.

Skin_Cancer.description: Whether the individual has skin cancer or not.

value_dict.No: The individual does not have skin cancer.

Other_Cancer.description: Whether the individual has any other type of cancer or not.

value_dict.No: The individual does not have any other type of cancer.
value_dict.Yes: The individual has another type of cancer.

Depression.description: Whether the individual has depression or not.

value_dict.No: The individual does not have depression.

Diabetes.description: Whether the individual has diabetes or not.

value_dict.No: The individual does not have diabetes.
value_dict.No, pre-diabetes or borderline diabetes: The individual does not have diabetes, but has pre-diabetes or borderline diabetes.
value_dict.Yes, but female told only during pregnan: The individual has diabetes, but was only told during pregnancy (female).

Arthritis.description: Whether the individual has arthritis or not.

value_dict.No: The individual does not have arthritis.

Age_Category.description: The age category of the individual.

Height_(cm).description: The height of the individual in centimeters.

Weight_(kg).description: The weight of the individual in kilograms.

BMI.description: The Body Mass Index of the individual.

Smoking_History.description: The smoking history of the individual.

value_dict.Yes: The individual has a history of smoking.
value_dict.No: The individual does not have a history of smoking.

Green_Vegetables_Consumption.description: The frequency of green vegetables consumption.

FriedPotato_Consumption.description: The frequency of fried potato consumption.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in health risk prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the individual, please predict if the individual has heart disease.

class_value_dict.No: The individual does not have heart disease.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in health risk prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the individual, please predict the diabetes status of the individual.
prompt.answer_prompt: No[0], Yes[1], No, pre-diabetes or borderline diabetes[2], Yes, but female told only during pregnancy[3]?

class_value_dict.No: The individual does not have diabetes.
class_value_dict.No, pre-diabetes or borderline diabetes: The individual does not have diabetes, but has pre-diabetes or borderline diabetes.
class_value_dict.Yes, but female told only during pregnan: The individual has diabetes, but was only told during pregnancy (female).

class_value_dict.Yes: The individual has another type of cancer.
